original_text: But Hannah did not go up, for she said to her husband, “As soon as the child is weaned, I will bring him, so that he may appear in the presence of the Lord and dwell there forever.”
korean_text: 오직 한나는 올라가지 아니하고 그의 남편에게 이르되 아이를 젖 떼거든 내가 그를 데리고 가서 여호와 앞에 뵙게 하고 거기에 영원히 있게 하리이다 하니

sentences.original_text: But Hannah did not go up
for she said to her husband
As soon as the child is weaned
so that he may appear in the presence of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 주 앞에 나타나게 하기 위함입니다
